item.title: How can i make agility look nice?
item.dc:creator: @Yohurt Yohurt
item.description:
@Yohurt wrote:

Hey,
Im working on a agility course and now i want to add some animations to it (its just click and teleporting atm)
This is my code:

addSkillXP((5*playerLevel[16]), 16); sendMessage("You jump over the hurdle"); emotes = 1; pEmote = 3067; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; teleportToX = 3540; teleportToY = objectY + 1;
But now it teleports before the animation has started :(.
How can i make it look nicer so it moves at the right moment?
Gr Yohurt

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make agility look nice?
